entry.title: A Quick Primer on TensorFrames: Apache Spark and TensorFlow Together
entry.summary:
Description

This session will provide a high-level primer on the burgeoning field of Deep Learning and the reasons why it is important. It will provide the fundamentals surrounding feature learning and neural networks required for deep learning. As well, this session will provide a quick start for TensorFrames for Apache Spark.

Abstract

This session will provide a high-level primer on the burgeoning field of Deep Learning and the reasons why it is important. It will provide the fundamentals surrounding feature learning and neural networks required for deep learning; more specifically:

  • What is Deep Learning?
  • A primer on feature learning
  • What is feature engineering?
  • What is TensorFlow?
  • Introducing TensorFrames
  • TensorFrames â€“ quick start

In addition to reviewing the concepts, we will have demos and provide links to notebooks that attendees will be able to use.
